alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:26PM CDT until June 16 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Eastern Tate County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hernando, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southaven, Horn Lake, Hernando, Coldwater, Barr, Eudora, Independence, Lewisburg, Wakefield, Trinity, Cockrum, Frees Corners, Aiken, Crossroad, Bright, Nesbit, Poagville, Robinson Gin, Looxahoma and Alden. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
